input.sentences: the military cemeteries are full of fallen heroes .
a widow pays her respects to her fall husband .
she brings a folded flag | a symbol of what he fought and died for .
sometimes she will sit and spend some time at the cemetary to reflect .
but in the end | she knows she must eventually move on .
output.sentences: Where is my grandfather's grave; he is veteran of the Second Great War but not interred in home soil.
I am glad that I found it; waste of time and money to come here to Europe if I did not.
Grandfather, I brought you heritage from the fatherland.
I wonder what he was like.
Geez, there are a lot of graves here!
